resources.title: 2018 IT Salary Guide
resources.description: Want to know more about technology salaries in your location? This guide gives you salary data for more than 75 IT jobs, current hiring trends, and skills now in demand.

resources.title: Sample Resume - Entry Level IT
resources.description: Translate your education and work experience into strong material for your resume. Monster.com has put together a sample resume template to help you get started.

resources.title: Glassdoor IT Job Search
resources.description: Find IT jobs in your area using glassdoor.com. Receive a custom salary estimate based on your title, company, location and experience.

resources.title: Randstad IT Job Search
resources.description: Randstad’s employment experts have an extensive understanding of IT hiring trends and national and local market fluctuations. Using their vast knowledge of the technologies workforce, they’ve predicted the best IT jobs for 2017.

resources.title: IT Jobs Requiring Security Clearance
resources.description: Find security clearance jobs in intelligence, geospatial, cybersecurity, logistics, aerospace, technology, engineering and more requiring levels of security clearance like top secret, ts/sci, polygraph and more.
